Docs.typeparam: Class describing input schema to the model.
Class describing the output schema of the prediction.
Docs.param: The time series pipeline in the form of a .
To ignore missing columns. Default is false.
Input schema definition. Default is null.
Output schema definition. Default is null.
Docs.summary: creates a prediction engine for a time series pipeline. It updates the state of time series model with observations seen at prediction phase and allows checkpointing the model.
Docs.p: Example code can be found by searching for TimeSeriesPredictionEngine in ML.NET.

example.format: This is an example for detecting change point using Singular Spectrum Analysis (SSA) model. [!code-csharp[MF](~/../docs/samples/docs/samples/Microsoft.ML.Samples/Dynamic/Transforms/TimeSeries/DetectChangePointBySsa.cs)]
